title: Double shooting in Pulaski County leaves two injured
content:
PULASKI COUNTY (KATV) —
The Pulaski County Sheriff's Office is investigating a double shooting at 12526 Ironton Cut Off Road.
It happened at about 3 p.m. Sunday.
According to the police, one victim was shot in the chest and another victim was shot in the leg.
Both victims, identified as a 17 and 21-year-old, were sent to the hospital with what police say appeared to be non-life threatening injuries.
Police are looking for three suspects.
